sen.j: 中村 歌昇（なかむら かしょう）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡。
sen.e: "Kasho NAKAMURA" is a professional name which has been used by Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
"Kasho NAKAMURA" is a professional name which has been used by Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
"Kasho NAKAMURA" is a professional name which has been used by Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.

sen.j: 屋号は二代目までが播磨屋 (歌舞伎)、三代目以後は萬屋。
sen.e: The first and the second generations used Harima-ya as their yago (stage family name) and the subsequent generations have used Yorozu-ya.
The first and the second generations used Harima-ya as their yago (stage family name) and the subsequent generations have used Yorozu-ya.
The first and the second generations used Harima-ya as their yago (stage family name) and the subsequent generations have used Yorozu-ya.
Kasho NAKAMURA the First
sen.cmt: リンク先の用語と混ざっているようです。ウェブ確認しましたところ、こちらの原文は「初代 中村歌昇」となります。
sen.e: Kasho NAKAMURA the First
Kasho NAKAMURA the First
He was the second son of Karoku NAKAMURA the Third.
He was the second son of Karoku NAKAMURA the Third.
He was the second son of Karoku NAKAMURA the Third.
He later became Tokizo NAKAMURA the Second.
He later became Tokizo NAKAMURA the Second.
He later became Tokizo NAKAMURA the Second.
Kasho NAKAMURA the Second

Kasho NAKAMURA the Second
He was the second son of Tokizo NAKAMURA the Third.
He was the second son of Tokizo NAKAMURA the Third.
He was the second son of Tokizo NAKAMURA the Third.

sen.j: 病気のため役者を引退。
sen.e: He retired from his career as a Kabuki actor due to his sickness.
He retired from his career as a Kabuki actor due to his sickness.
He retired from his career as a Kabuki actor due to his sickness.

sen.j: 死後に四代目中村歌六を追贈される。
sen.e: He was granted the name of Karoku NAKAMURA the Fourth after his death.
He was granted the name of Karoku NAKAMURA the Fourth after his death.
He was granted the name of Karoku NAKAMURA the Fourth after his death.
Kasho NAKAMURA the Third
Kasho NAKAMURA the Third
Kasho NAKAMURA the Third
He is the second son of the second generation.
sen.cmt: 現在活躍中の役者のため、現在形で表記いたしました。
sen.e: He is the second son of the second generation.
